result.purpose: Responsible for defining and managing Ethereum contract ABIs and related constants for token swaps and liquidity management.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to Ethereum contract ABIs and token management in separate Go files.

pkg/roninabi/abi.go.purpose: Defines constants and embeds ABI JSON files for various Ethereum contracts, and initializes a map of contract names to their respective ABIs.
side_effects: Panic if there is an error parsing the ABI JSON.
risks: Potential panic due to malformed ABI JSON.

pkg/roninabi/katana_method.go.purpose: Defines constants for various Katana method types related to token swaps and liquidity management.
